description:
Double sided sharpeners offer 2 surfaces in one lightweight sharpener, and when used with the guides, you'll be able to accurately match angles for a factory perfect edge everytime.

  • Monocrystalline diamond surface sharpens knives faster than conventional stones
  • Double sided sharpeners are 24cm open, 13cm closed. Folding plastic handles protect sharpener when not in use
  • Includes coarse diamond (45 micron / 325 mesh) to quickly restore an edge, fine diamond (25 micron / 600 mesh) for a razor sharp edge, extra-fine (9 micron / 1200 mesh) to polish and refine an edge, and extra-extra fine (3 micron / 8000 mesh) to polish edges of all bonded diamond abrasives
  • Blade guide offers 7-angle adjustability and can be used with any bench stone
name: DMT Diafold Magna-Guide Kit
